Welcome to RIRR’s documentation!¶

RRIR (Reflection & Room Impulse Response) is a Python library to process acoustic impulse measurements for RIR and Transferfunction anlysis.

Some common usecases are documented in :doc: usage.

  • Example use cases of the Signal Class
    • Installation
    • Creation of Impulse Responses from Sweeps
    • Plot Impulse Response
    • Cut and/or average multiple impulses
  • RRIR
    • RRIR package
      • Submodules
      • RRIR.Ambi module
      • RRIR.Reflection module
      • RRIR.Signal module
      • RRIR.Transfer_function module
      • RRIR.test_Ambi module
      • Module contents

Note

This project is under active developement. For the newest versions, please check github.
